title: Recommend a handscript font/magazine
content:
Hi there...  
I’d be glad to see your recommendations for a sexy/curvy/cool **bold and bold** handscript-style font (both free & not free:)). looking for one to use as a magazine title/logo...

inspiration is “Dunhill” cigarette’s 100 anniversary edition.

cheers.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [TJI0207\_Packaging\_Dunhill02.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090727131928/http:/typophile.com/files/TJI0207_Packaging_Dunhill02.jpg) | 12.32 KB |
author: tbuzz

comments.content:
How about Cuisine, Mr Sheppards, Mr Stalwart by sudtipos - [www.sudtipos.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20090727131928/http:/www.sudtipos.com/ "www.sudtipos.com")

JH
thanks for the options..they are cool. from the same source I liked “Candy Script”!
good one, have it..i thouhgt it may better be floating one..means better a Sans, woven feeling
